name: ANKH (itch)
description:
In 2230 B.C a dead pharaoh discovered a way to travel from the Duat (Realm of the death) back to life, His desire was to destroy all the other great pharaohs tombs to be the greatest pharaoh to rule Egypt.

The tomb keeper of the great pyramids will try to stop him after he unleashed the pharaonic curse on the great pyramids. Using her legendary staff and it's ability to create different holes.
